title: ‚≠ê The Data Pipeline Challenge
subtitle: Complete CSV Processing System
description:
# ‚≠ê CHALLENGE: CSV Data Pipeline

üèÜ Build a complete data processing system!

## Requirements

1. Read inventory CSV
2. Filter low stock items
3. Calculate total value
4. Export filtered results
5. Generate summary report

‚öîÔ∏è Master CSV processing!
starterCode:
import csv
import io

INVENTORY_CSV = '''item,quantity,price,category
Sword,5,100,weapon
Potion,50,10,consumable
Shield,2,80,armor
Scroll,30,15,consumable'''

# TODO: Implement complete pipeline
reader = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(INVENTORY_CSV))

# Filter low stock (quantity < 10)
low_stock = [row for row in reader if int(row['quantity']) < 10]

print(f'Low stock items: {len(low_stock)}')
for item in low_stock:
    print(f"  {item['item']}: {item['quantity']} units")

# Calculate total inventory value
reader2 = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(INVENTORY_CSV))
total_value = sum(int(row['quantity']) * int(row['price']) for row in reader2)
print(f'\nTotal inventory value: {total_value} gold')
solutionCode:
import csv
import io

INVENTORY_CSV = '''item,quantity,price,category
Sword,5,100,weapon
Potion,50,10,consumable
Shield,2,80,armor
Scroll,30,15,consumable'''

reader = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(INVENTORY_CSV))
low_stock = [row for row in reader if int(row['quantity']) < 10]

print(f'Low stock items: {len(low_stock)}')
for item in low_stock:
    print(f"  {item['item']}: {item['quantity']} units")

reader2 = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(INVENTORY_CSV))
total_value = sum(int(row['quantity']) * int(row['price']) for row in reader2)
print(f'\nTotal inventory value: {total_value} gold')
